name: Roland Goes Square Bashing
overview:
A logic puzzle game in the popular Roland game series. In this game Roland looks a little more square and squashed than usual but he has a very square job to accomplish, as the goal of the game is to visit each square in the game area just a single time as they start to dissolve as soon as you step on them. So you have a short period of time to determine the path that will get you to every square and then you have to do it with a quickness or go falling into space.
It isn't exactly Ethel the Aardvark goes Quantity Surveying but it ramps up to a pretty good challenge.
